title: Blocked after someone else dodging a game in Poro King.
body: As soon as I clicked the Lock In Button. I was immediately Booted. and penalized.... happen to anyone else? Is the whole Queue put on Blocked too? I don't know, was solo queueing in Poro King.

replies.body: Hey, sorry to hear this happened.  :(  It may be a good idea to not queue up against just yet, otherwise your [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) might escalate.  It does sound like some kind of block happened, likely a connection issue that other lost sync or disconnected you from the champion select service.  For now I recommend going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and testing it in a custom game first.  I hope that helps!
I didn't dodge, I selected a champ, I banned a champ then I got banned for 30 minutes. I don't understand why
This has also been happening to me. I thought someone bailed but it says that I quit. It's happened twice in a row now with a 30 min ban. Not fun :(

This happened to me too. In champ select for Poro King, just as timer finished counting down I was booted and given a 15min penalty. I tried playing about two hours later, and same thing happened, but a 30 min penalty.

You're not the only one. This has happened to me twice in the last few days.

I'll be pissed if this continues and I get action taken against my account. I have legitimately left maybe 5 games in 5+ years of playing.
